title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: NoneClassical Sets and Fuzzy Sets, Classical Relation and Fuzzy relation, Properties of membership function, fuzzification and Defuzzification, Fuzzy arithmetic, Fuzzy control systems, feed forward neural network, recurrent neural network, back-propagation learning, neural control
